img_source: Par Henry Vandyke Carter, CC0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 網球擊球「動力鏈」的核心傳輸帶。在正手拍與雙手反拍時負責強力的軀幹旋轉，將下肢產生的力量傳遞至球拍，同時在發球時協助軀幹側屈與旋轉。
desc_en: The core transmission belt of the tennis 'kinetic chain'. Responsible for powerful trunk rotation during forehands and double-handed backhands, transferring force from legs to racquet. Also assists in trunk lateral flexion and rotation during serves.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 與對側腹外斜肌形成對角線發力。在開放式站姿擊球（Open Stance）中，負責控制急停後的軀幹旋轉與減速，確保擊球後的身體平衡回復。
desc_en: Works diagonally with the contralateral external oblique. In open stance shots, it controls trunk rotation and deceleration after sudden stops, ensuring body balance recovery after the stroke.

img_source: Mongrangvebet, CC BY-SA 3.0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 發球動作中「弓身（Arch）」後的快速收縮肌。負責將胸廓猛力下拉以產生發球速度（Snap down），並在底線多拍來回中維持核心對抗旋轉扭力。
desc_en: The rapid contractor after the 'arch' in the service motion. Responsible for forcefully pulling the rib cage down to generate serve speed (snap down) and maintaining core stability against rotational torque during baseline rallies.

img_source: modified by Uwe Gille, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 所有網球動作的穩定基石。在擊球預備動作（Split Step）時預先收縮，保護腰椎免受擊球時巨大扭轉力的傷害，是預防網球員下背痛的關鍵。
desc_en: The foundational stabilizer for all tennis actions. Contracts anticipatorily during the split step, protecting the lumbar spine from the massive torsional forces of strokes. Key for preventing lower back pain in players.

img_source: Bildbearbetning: sv:Användare:Chrizz, CC BY-SA 3.0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 協助正手拍的上揮動作（Low-to-High）並在隨揮期（Follow-through）控制手肘屈曲。在發球的「搔背動作（Back scratch）」中被拉長儲能，隨後協助前臂旋後。
desc_en: Assists the low-to-high swing path of the forehand and controls elbow flexion during the follow-through. It is stretched to store energy during the 'back scratch' phase of the serve, subsequently assisting in forearm supination.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在網球底線抽球中，負責控制肘關節的屈曲角度。當球拍與球接觸瞬間，提供肘部的穩固支撐，防止因球的衝擊力導致手肘過度伸直。
desc_en: Controls elbow flexion angle during baseline groundstrokes. Provides solid elbow support at the moment of ball impact, preventing hyperextension caused by the shock of the ball.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 協助正手拍的擊球動作，特別是將手臂向前上方帶動的過程。在發球時協助肩關節屈曲與內收，引導球拍進入擊球點。
desc_en: Assists in the forehand stroke, particularly in bringing the arm forward and upward. Helps with shoulder flexion and adduction during the serve, guiding the racquet to the contact point.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 發球爆發力的關鍵。在發球的「加速期」，負責快速伸直手肘將拍頭向上推向擊球點。單手反拍擊球時亦需此肌肉強立鎖定手肘。
desc_en: Key to serve explosiveness. During the acceleration phase of the serve, it rapidly extends the elbow to drive the racquet head up to contact. Also requires strong locking of the elbow during a one-handed backhand.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在發球的後擺階段（Cocking Phase）被極度拉伸，儲存彈性位能。隨後在擊球瞬間釋放力量，並協助肩關節伸展。對於過頂殺球（Smash）同樣重要。
desc_en: Maximally stretched during the cocking phase of the serve to store elastic energy. Releases power at impact and assists in shoulder extension. Equally important for the overhead smash.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在截擊（Volley）時負責精確控制手肘伸直角度，提供擊球瞬間的剛性。在切球（Slice）動作中維持手臂的延伸。
desc_en: Responsible for precise elbow extension control during volleys, providing rigidity at impact. Maintains arm extension during the slice stroke.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 發球動作中「背弓（Trophy Pose）」的主要維持肌。負責在屈膝蓄力時保護脊椎，並在擊球後控制軀幹的前屈減速，承受極高的反覆應力。
desc_en: Primary maintainer of the 'Trophy Pose' arch during the serve. Protects the spine during the loading phase and controls trunk forward flexion deceleration after impact, withstanding high repetitive stress.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 網球發球的「發動機」。在發球加速期負責強力的肩內旋與伸展，產生極大拍頭速度。同時也是隨揮減速期保護肩關節的重要離心煞車。
desc_en: The 'engine' of the tennis serve. Generates massive racquet head speed via powerful shoulder internal rotation and extension during acceleration. Also a vital eccentric brake protecting the shoulder during follow-through deceleration.

img_source: modified by Uwe Gille, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在網球側向移動與大角度救球時，負責穩定骨盆與脊椎。發球時協助產生側向屈曲（Side bend），對發球落點與旋轉控制至關重要。
desc_en: Stabilizes pelvis and spine during lateral movements and wide reaches. Assists in lateral flexion during the serve, crucial for serve placement and spin control.

img_source: Polygon data were generated by Database Center for Life Science (DBCLS), CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 網球員防止「翻腳刀」的第一道防線。在激烈的側向滑步與急停轉向中，負責維持腳踝外側穩定，抵抗巨大的內翻扭力。
desc_en: The first line of defense against ankle sprains for tennis players. Maintains lateral ankle stability against massive inversion torque during intense lateral sliding and sudden directional changes.

name_zh: 腓骨長肌（重複項-請參照Peroneus Longus）
img_source: Polygon data were generated by Database Center for Life Science (DBCLS)[2], CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在網球側向滑步（Slide）時，負責將大拇指蹠骨壓向地面，提供內側抓地力與穩定性，是變向啟動的重要支點。
desc_en: Depresses the first metatarsal during lateral slides, providing medial traction and stability. A crucial fulcrum for changing direction.

img_source: Polygon data were generated by Database Center for Life Science (DBCLS)[2], CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 爆發力的來源。負責發球時的跳躍推蹬，以及「分腿墊步（Split Step）」後的快速啟動。網球腿（Tennis Leg，內側頭撕裂）的高風險部位。
desc_en: Source of explosive power. Responsible for the jump drive in serving and rapid acceleration after the 'split step'. High risk site for 'Tennis Leg' (medial head tear).

img_source: Polygon data is generated by Database Center for Life Science (DBCLS), CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在網球長時間的「屈膝預備姿勢（Ready Position）」中維持平衡。提供多拍來回奔跑的耐力，並在急停時吸收衝擊。
desc_en: Maintains balance during the prolonged bent-knee 'ready position'. Provides endurance for long rallies and absorbs shock during sudden stops.

img_source: https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/d/df/Inferior_view_of_tibialis_posterior_muscle_-_animation.gif
desc: 在硬地網球場上，負責支撐足弓以應對頻繁的急停煞車與變向。若疲勞失能，易引發足底筋膜炎與內側脛骨壓力症候群。
desc_en: Supports the arch against frequent hard stops and direction changes on hard courts. Fatigue leads to plantar fasciitis and medial tibial stress syndrome.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在激烈的側向移動（Lateral movement）中，擴大足部外側支撐面，協助身體在急停後迅速回位。
desc_en: Increases the lateral base of support during intense lateral movement, helping the body recover quickly after sudden stops.

img_source: modified by Uwe Gille, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 網球步伐中內側足弓的穩定器。在發球蹬地與正手拍的旋轉推蹬（Pivot）動作中，防止足部過度旋前，確保力量有效傳遞。
desc_en: Medial arch stabilizer in tennis footwork. Prevents excessive pronation during the serve push-off and forehand pivot, ensuring efficient power transfer.

img_source: Image:Gray445.png modified by Uwe Gille, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在網球頻繁的左右橫移中，維持橫向足弓的剛性。協助在發球落地時抓穩地面，並在變向時提供足底推進槓桿。
desc_en: Maintains transverse arch rigidity during frequent lateral movements. Assists in gripping the court upon serve landing and provides a plantar lever for direction changes.

img_source: Polygon data were generated by Database Center for Life Science (DBCLS), CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在交叉步（Crossover step）或回位步法中，協助提起腳趾避免絆倒。急停時協助分散衝擊力，防止腳趾撞擊鞋頭（黑指甲）。
desc_en: Helps lift toes to prevent tripping during crossover steps or recovery. Distributes impact forces during sudden stops, preventing toe jam (black toenails).

img_source: Was a bee, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在網球快速移動中確保大拇指背屈離地。若網球鞋鞋帶綁太緊，容易壓迫此肌腱造成腳背疼痛。
desc_en: Ensures great toe dorsiflexion/clearance during rapid tennis movements. Overtightened tennis shoe laces often compress this tendon, causing instep pain.

name_zh: 拇趾外展肌（內在肌視角）
img_source: modified by Uwe Gille, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 分腿墊步（Split Step）時的關鍵穩定肌。主動控制大拇指抓地，增加前腳掌接觸面積，為接下來的爆發移動做好準備。
desc_en: Key stabilizer during the split step. Actively controls big toe grip, increasing forefoot contact area to prepare for subsequent explosive movement.

img_source: Berichard, CC BY-SA 3.0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在硬地急停時，負責抓緊鞋底內襯，防止足部在鞋內滑動。強化此肌肉可減少足底筋膜在網球運動中的壓力。
desc_en: Grips the shoe liner during hard stops on hard courts, preventing foot sliding inside the shoe. Strengthening this muscle reduces plantar fascia stress in tennis.

img_source: Uwe Gille, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 負責穩定腳趾關節。在網球發球墊起腳尖（Heel off）的瞬間，防止腳趾過度捲曲，確保推進力量平穩傳遞。
desc_en: Stabilizes toe joints. Prevents excessive toe curling during the 'heel off' phase of the serve, ensuring smooth power transfer.

img_source: Polygon data were generated by Database Center for Life Science (DBCLS)[2], CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 側向滑步的穩定樞紐。肌腱繞過足底，在側向蹬地時鎖住內側足弓，確保力量能轉化為橫向移動速度而非被足弓塌陷吸收。
desc_en: Stability hub for lateral slides. Tendon locks the medial arch during lateral push-off, ensuring force is converted to lateral speed rather than lost to arch collapse.

img_source: Berichard d'après Gray's anatomy, CC BY-SA 3.0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 協助調整腳趾抓地角度。在網球複雜的多向步法中，確保腳趾能直線施力，維持足弓結構穩定。
desc_en: Adjusts toe grip angle. Ensures linear toe force application and arch structural stability during complex multi-directional tennis footwork.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 負責穩定球拍握持。在正反手變換握拍法（Grip change）時頻繁運作。過度使用易導致「迪奎凡氏症 (De Quervain's Tenosynovitis)」。
desc_en: Stabilizes racquet grip. Frequently active during forehand/backhand grip changes. Overuse leads to 'De Quervain's Tenosynovitis'.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在上旋球（Topspin）擊球中，協助快速將拍頭向上帶動（刷球）。同時在長時間比賽中維持握拍耐力與肘部穩定。
desc_en: Assists in rapidly brushing the racquet head up for topspin shots. Also maintains grip endurance and elbow stability during long matches.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 「網球肘（Lateral Epicondylitis）」的元凶。在單手反拍擊球瞬間負責穩定手腕，抵抗強大的擊球衝擊力。若擊球點太慢或握拍過緊，此肌腱極易受傷。
desc_en: The culprit of 'Tennis Elbow'. Stabilizes the wrist against massive impact forces during the one-handed backhand. Highly prone to injury if timing is late or grip is too tight.

img_source: Me, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 與短肌共同作用，是反手拍擊球時穩定手腕的主力。在隨揮階段協助手腕保持伸展，確保球拍面穩定。過度使用亦是網球肘的成因之一。
desc_en: Works with the brevis as the main stabilizer of the wrist during backhand strokes. Assists in maintaining wrist extension during the follow-through to ensure racquet face stability. Overuse is a contributing factor to tennis elbow.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 雙手反拍擊球時的重要穩定肌。負責非慣用手的腕部伸展與尺偏（Ulnar deviation），幫助球拍順暢地通過擊球區。
desc_en: Important stabilizer for the double-handed backhand. Responsible for wrist extension and ulnar deviation of the non-dominant hand, helping the racquet accelerate smoothly through the contact zone.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 協助握拍的微調。在反手切球（Slice）或截擊時，小指側的張力控制對於維持拍面角度與手感（Touch）有輔助作用。
desc_en: Assists in fine-tuning the grip. During backhand slices or volleys, tension control on the ulnar side aids in maintaining racquet face angle and 'touch'.

img_source: Mikael Häggström, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 平衡屈肌群的握力，防止握拍過死。在擊球瞬間提供動態張力以穩定手腕，特別是在單手反拍的高點擊球時。
desc_en: Balances the gripping force of flexors, preventing an excessively tight grip. Provides dynamic tension to stabilize the wrist at impact, especially during high-contact one-handed backhands.

img_source: Mikael Häggström, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 許多網球選手在握拍時會將食指稍微分開（Trigger finger），此肌肉負責控制該手指的獨立動作，增加對拍頭的感知與控制。
desc_en: Many tennis players use a 'trigger finger' grip (index finger separated). This muscle controls the independent action of that finger, enhancing racquet head awareness and control.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 負責穩定拇指在握把背面的位置，特別是在雙手反拍時，非慣用手的拇指支撐對於槓桿作用至關重要。
desc_en: Stabilizes the thumb position on the back of the handle. Particularly in the double-handed backhand, the thumb support of the non-dominant hand is crucial for leverage.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在轉換握拍方式（如從正手轉大陸式握拍）時，負責快速伸展拇指以利轉動拍柄。隨後協助拇指鎖定新的握拍位置。
desc_en: Responsible for rapidly extending the thumb to facilitate handle rotation during grip changes (e.g., forehand to Continental). Subsequently helps lock the thumb into the new grip position.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 正手拍上旋球（Topspin）的關鍵肌群之一。負責在擊球瞬間快速屈腕與外展，產生「雨刷式（Windshield wiper）」動作，製造強烈旋轉。
desc_en: A key muscle for the topspin forehand. Responsible for rapid wrist flexion and abduction at impact, generating the 'windshield wiper' motion to create heavy spin.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 發球「扣腕（Snap）」動作的主力。在發球擊球瞬間，負責強力的手腕屈曲與尺偏，是發球球速的主要來源之一。
desc_en: The powerhouse of the serve 'snap'. Responsible for forceful wrist flexion and ulnar deviation at the moment of impact, being a major source of serve speed.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 負責手指末端的抓握力。在擊球瞬間，手指需瞬間用力抓緊拍柄以對抗球的衝擊（Impact stability），防止球拍翻轉。
desc_en: Responsible for distal finger grip strength. Fingers must momentarily clamp down on the handle at impact to resist shock (impact stability) and prevent the racquet from twisting.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 網球握拍的基礎力量來源。長時間過度緊握球拍會導致此肌肉疲勞，進而引起「高爾夫球肘（內側上髁炎）」，這在過度使用正手拍上旋的球員中常見。
desc_en: The foundation of tennis grip strength. Prolonged excessive gripping fatigues this muscle, leading to 'Golfer's Elbow' (medial epicondylitis), common in players who overuse topspin forehands.

img_source: Me, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在任何握拍方式中，負責拇指對拍柄的鎖定力量。特別是在截擊時，強而有力的拇指支撐能確保拍面不被球的衝力頂開。
desc_en: Responsible for locking the thumb onto the handle in any grip style. Especially in volleys, strong thumb support ensures the racquet face isn't forced open by the ball's impact.

img_source: Henry Gray, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 輔助屈腕動作。雖然功能較弱，但在發球與正手扣殺的屈腕加速階段（Wrist snap）仍有貢獻。
desc_en: Assists in wrist flexion. Although weak, it contributes during the wrist snap acceleration phase of serves and forehand smashes.

img_source: Selket at English Wikipedia, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 正手拍產生上旋（Topspin）的關鍵深層肌。在隨揮階段負責快速旋前前臂，使拍面蓋過球體。發球時亦協助手臂內旋以增加球速。
desc_en: Key deep muscle for generating forehand topspin. Responsbile for rapid forearm pronation during follow-through to close the racquet face over the ball. Also assists arm internal rotation for speed on the serve.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 現代網球「強力正手拍」的引擎之一。在擊球瞬間與隨揮期強力旋前前臂，製造強烈上旋。亦是發球最後階段手臂內旋的重要推手。
desc_en: One of the engines of the modern 'power forehand'. Powerfully pronates the forearm at impact and follow-through to create heavy topspin. Also a key driver of arm internal rotation in the final phase of the serve.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 反手切球（Slice）的關鍵肌。負責保持前臂旋後（手掌朝上）的姿態，使球拍能「切」過球的底部。在踢發球（Kick Serve）的準備階段也至關重要。
desc_en: Key muscle for the backhand slice. Maintains the supinated forearm position (palm up), allowing the racquet to 'cut' under the ball. Also critical during the preparation phase of a kick serve.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在握拍時負責穩定拍柄底部（Butt cap）的位置。在需要細膩手感的截擊與放小球（Drop shot）時，控制手掌尺側的穩定度。
desc_en: Stabilizes the position of the butt cap during gripping. Controls stability on the ulnar side of the palm during volleys and drop shots requiring delicate touch.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 調整拇指位置以適應不同握拍法（如從東方式轉大陸式）。確保拇指能快速張開並重新包裹拍柄。
desc_en: Adjusts thumb position to adapt to different grips (e.g., Eastern to Continental). Ensures the thumb can quickly open and re-wrap around the handle.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 握拍力量的關鍵。將拇指緊壓向食指，鎖定球拍。在擊球瞬間提供抗扭轉的穩定性，但長期過度緊握會導致肌肉僵硬。
desc_en: Key to grip strength. Presses the thumb firmly against the index finger to lock the racquet. Provides anti-rotational stability at impact, though chronic over-gripping causes stiffness.

img_source: CFCF, CC BY-SA 4.0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在「食指扣板機（Trigger finger）」式握拍中，負責將食指外展並扣住拍柄上方，增加力臂與控制力，這在發球與正手拍中很常見。
desc_en: In the 'trigger finger' grip, abducts the index finger to hook the upper handle, increasing leverage and control. Common in serves and forehands.

img_source: CFCF, CC BY-SA 4.0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 協助調整手指間距，優化握拍的壓力分佈，確保球拍在擊球時不會在手中滑動。
desc_en: Helps adjust finger spacing to optimize grip pressure distribution, ensuring the racquet doesn't slip in the hand during impact.

img_source: CFCF, CC BY-SA 4.0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 維持無名指與中指的相對位置，對於廣泛分佈手指壓力的握拍法（如西方式握拍）很重要。
desc_en: Maintains relative position of the ring and middle fingers. Important for grip styles that distribute pressure widely, like the Western grip.

img_source: CFCF, CC BY-SA 4.0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 負責小指的外展。在雙手反拍中，非慣用手的小指與無名指通常負責主要的抓握力量，此肌肉協助定位。
desc_en: Abducts the little finger. In the double-handed backhand, the little and ring fingers of the non-dominant hand often provide the primary gripping force; this muscle assists in positioning.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 強化小指對拍柄底部的抓握力。在發球的鞭打動作（Whip）末端，確保球拍不會脫手飛出。
desc_en: Reinforces the little finger's grip on the handle butt. Ensures the racquet doesn't slip out of the hand at the end of the service whip motion.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 協助拇指彎曲包裹握把。在每次擊球間的「轉拍（Racquet twirl）」習慣動作中，此肌肉與對立肌共同控制球拍的旋轉。
desc_en: Helps the thumb curl around the handle. During the habitual 'racquet twirl' between points, this muscle works with the opponens to control rotation.

img_source: Image:Gray427.png modified, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 負責掌指關節屈曲，是形成正確握拍手型（C型手）的關鍵，避免死握球拍，保持手掌內部的空間與彈性。
desc_en: Flexes the MCP joint, key to forming the correct grip shape (C-shape). Prevents death-gripping, maintaining space and elasticity within the palm.

img_source: Image:Gray427.png modified, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 協助中指包覆拍柄。在截擊時，蚓狀肌的本體感覺功能有助於快速調整握拍壓力以吸收球速。
desc_en: Assists the middle finger in wrapping the handle. During volleys, the proprioceptive function of lumbricals helps rapidly adjust grip pressure to absorb ball speed.

img_source: Image:Gray427.png modified, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 維持無名指的柔和抓握。在發球準備動作中，保持手指放鬆對於隨後的爆發力傳遞至關重要。
desc_en: Maintains a soft grip with the ring finger. Keeping fingers relaxed during the serve preparation is vital for subsequent explosive power transfer.

img_source: Image:Gray427.png modified, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 協助小指維持適當張力。放鬆的蚓狀肌有助於在擊球前一刻保持手腕靈活（Loose wrist），這是產生拍頭速度的秘訣。
desc_en: Maintains appropriate tension in the little finger. Relaxed lumbricals help keep a 'loose wrist' right before impact, the secret to generating racquet head speed.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 維持手掌的杯狀結構，使球拍柄能穩固地嵌入掌心。在強力擊球時防止球拍在手中旋轉（Off-center hits）。
desc_en: Maintains the cupped shape of the palm, allowing the handle to sit securely. Prevents the racquet from twisting in the hand during off-center hits.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 負責將拇指轉向手掌中心，這是所有網球握拍法的基礎動作，確保手掌能完整包覆並控制球拍柄的八個斜面。
desc_en: Rotates the thumb toward the palm center. This is the foundational action for all tennis grips, ensuring the hand fully wraps and controls the eight bevels of the handle.

img_source: Braus, Hermann, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 負責食指的內收動作。在緊密握拍（如大陸式握拍）時，協助食指靠攏中指，提供穩定的支撐面，防止球拍在發球擊球瞬間滑動。
desc_en: Responsible for index finger adduction. Assists in keeping the index finger close to the middle finger during tight grips (like Continental), providing a stable support surface to prevent racquet slippage at serve impact.

img_source: Braus, Hermann, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 負責無名指內收。與其他手部肌肉協同，確保在正手拍擊球時，手指能緊密包裹握把，傳遞來自前臂的旋轉力量。
desc_en: Adducts the ring finger. Works with other hand muscles to ensure fingers tightly wrap the handle during forehands, transferring rotational force from the forearm.

img_source: Braus, Hermann, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 負責小指內收。在任何握拍方式中，協助鎖定握把的底部，防止球拍在揮拍過程中因離心力而脫手。
desc_en: Adducts the little finger. Helps lock the bottom of the handle in any grip style, preventing the racquet from flying out due to centrifugal force during swings.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 保護小魚際區的神經血管。在長期緊握球拍的摩擦下，其收縮可稍微加厚小魚際隆起，提供對尺神經的緩衝。
desc_en: Protects neurovascular structures of the hypothenar eminence. Contraction slightly thickens the hypothenar pad, providing a buffer for the ulnar nerve against prolonged racquet gripping friction.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 許多職業球員在發力擊球時會咬緊牙關，雖然能暫時增加核心剛性，但長期過度咬合會導致頸部僵硬，影響頭部追蹤球的靈活性。
desc_en: Many pros clench their jaw during power shots. While momentarily increasing core rigidity, chronic clenching leads to neck stiffness, impairing head flexibility for ball tracking.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 與咬肌協同工作。在關鍵分（Break point）的壓力下，球員常不自覺收縮此肌。放鬆下顎有助於釋放上半身多餘張力，改善發球流暢度。
desc_en: Works with the masseter. Players often unconsciously contract this muscle under pressure (e.g., break points). Relaxing the jaw releases excess upper body tension, improving serve fluidity.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 發球時頭部後仰注視拋球（Ball toss），此肌肉需維持穩定張力。過度緊繃可能導致緊縮型頭痛，影響比賽專注力。
desc_en: Maintains tension while the head tilts back to watch the ball toss during serving. Excessive tightness can cause tension headaches, affecting match focus.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在網球側向滑步後，負責將外展的腿迅速拉回中線（Recovery step），協助身體快速回到球場中央準備下一拍。
desc_en: After a lateral slide, quickly pulls the abducted leg back to the midline (recovery step), helping the body return to the center of the court for the next shot.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 發球動作中「腿部驅動（Leg Drive）」的主力。負責將屈膝積蓄的能量轉化為強力的髖伸展，將身體推向擊球點。也是開放式站姿正手拍的重要煞車與發力源。
desc_en: Powerhouse of the 'Leg Drive' in serving. Converts stored knee flexion energy into powerful hip extension, propelling the body up to contact. Also a key brake and power source for the open stance forehand.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 單腳著地發球後的骨盆穩定關鍵。防止發球落地時骨盆過度傾斜。在底線左右移動時，負責強力的側向推蹬（Lateral push-off）。
desc_en: Key pelvic stabilizer after landing a serve on one leg. Prevents excessive pelvic tilt upon impact. Responsible for powerful lateral push-off during baseline side-to-side movement.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在快速變向與轉身時，穩定髖關節，確保股骨頭緊貼髖臼。防止在極限救球時髖關節不穩定。
desc_en: Stabilizes the hip joint during rapid direction changes and pivots, keeping the femoral head secure. Prevents instability during extreme reaches for the ball.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 協助髖內收。在網球員進行大幅度跨步救球（Lunge）後，協助將前腳拉回。亦參與膝關節內側的穩定。
desc_en: Assists in hip adduction. Helps pull the lead leg back after a wide lunge for a ball. Also contributes to medial knee stability.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 發球「獎盃姿勢（Trophy Pose）」中，負責將前腳的髖部屈曲固定。在分腿墊步後，負責快速提起大腿啟動衝刺。
desc_en: Fixes the hip flexion of the front leg during the 'Trophy Pose' of the serve. rapid thigh lift to initiate sprinting after the split step.

img_source: Braus, Hermann, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 連接軀幹與下肢的樞紐。在正手拍旋轉時，負責帶動後腿跟進（Hip drive），將力量傳遞至上半身。過度緊繃會限制發球時的髖部伸展幅度，減少爆發力。
desc_en: Hub connecting trunk and legs. Drives the rear leg forward (hip drive) during forehand rotation, transferring power to the upper body. Tightness restricts hip extension range during the serve, reducing explosiveness.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在網球頻繁的開放式站姿（Open Stance）擊球中，提供深層髖關節穩定，確保股骨頭在劇烈旋轉下仍保持在位。
desc_en: Provides deep hip stability during frequent open stance shots, ensuring the femoral head remains centered under intense rotation.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 與其他外旋肌共同控制髖關節旋轉。在底線急停轉換方向時，精細調節股骨位置，防止受傷。
desc_en: Works with other external rotators to control hip rotation. Fine-tunes femoral position to prevent injury during sudden baseline direction changes.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在網球交叉步（Crossover step）中，負責啟動大腿的內收與屈曲。是鼠蹊部拉傷的高危險肌群。
desc_en: Initiates thigh adduction and flexion during the crossover step in tennis. A high-risk muscle for groin strains.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在發球著地或正手拍急停時，離心收縮以減速髖內旋，防止膝蓋內扣（Valgus）。網球員因頻繁急停，此肌肉常過度緊繃壓迫坐骨神經。
desc_en: Eccentrically contracts to decelerate hip internal rotation during serve landing or forehand stops, preventing knee valgus. Frequent sudden stops in tennis often make this muscle tight, compressing the sciatic nerve.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 發球時負責穩定腰椎，允許胸椎以上的後仰（Extension）。在擊球後的隨揮階段，協助將後腿向前帶動以回復站位。
desc_en: Stabilizes lumbar spine during the serve, allowing for thoracic extension. Pulls the trailing leg forward during the follow-through to recover stance.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 穩定髖關節後側。在網球員進行大幅度外旋步法（如開放式站姿的正手拍）時，提供關節囊的後方穩定。
desc_en: Stabilizes the posterior hip. Provides posterior capsule stability during wide external rotation footwork, such as the open stance forehand.

img_source: colorized by Michael Gasperl, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 側向移動的關鍵肌。協助抬腿並透過髂脛束穩定膝關節外側。在網球員中，常因代償無力的臀中肌而過度緊繃，導致膝外側疼痛。
desc_en: Key muscle for lateral movement. Assists leg lift and stabilizes the lateral knee via the IT Band. Often tight in tennis players compensating for weak glutes, causing lateral knee pain.

img_source: Polygon data were generated by Database Center for Life Science (DBCLS)[2], CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 保護膝關節的深層衛士。在網球急停轉向時，防止脛骨過度外旋，並協助膝關節從鎖定狀態解鎖，進入彎曲緩衝模式。
desc_en: Deep guardian of the knee. Prevents excessive tibial external rotation during sudden tennis stops and helps unlock the knee from a locked position to enter cushioning flexion.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在發球仰頭注視球（Toss）時，維持頸椎前側穩定。若過度使用（胸式呼吸），易導致臂叢神經受壓，引起手臂麻木。
desc_en: Stabilizes anterior cervical spine when looking up at the toss. Overuse (chest breathing) can compress the brachial plexus, causing arm numbness.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 協助張口與吞嚥。在比賽高張力狀態下，球員應避免緊咬牙關，保持二腹肌放鬆有助於減少頸部連鎖緊張。
desc_en: Assists in opening the mouth and swallowing. Players should avoid clenching teeth under high pressure; relaxing the digastric helps reduce kinetic chain tension in the neck.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 頸椎深層穩定肌。在擊球瞬間頭部受到強烈震盪時，保護頸椎結構。許多球員的慢性頸痛源於此肌肉無力。
desc_en: Deep cervical stabilizer. Protects cervical structures from head whiplash during powerful strokes. Weakness here is a common cause of chronic neck pain in players.

img_source: User:Mikael Häggström, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 形成口腔底部。發力擊球時，避免舌頭過度頂顎，保持口腔底放鬆有助於維持上呼吸道暢通。
desc_en: Forms the floor of the mouth. Avoid excessive tongue pressing against the palate during power shots; keeping the mouth floor relaxed helps maintain airway patency.

img_source: Berichard, CC BY-SA 3.0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 連接肩胛骨與喉部。在網球劇烈揮拍導致肩胛骨大幅移動時，負責協調頸部筋膜張力，防止影響呼吸道。
desc_en: Connects scapula to larynx. Coordinates cervical fascia tension during vigorous tennis swings where the scapula moves extensively, preventing airway impingement.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 負責頭部轉動以追蹤高速球路。在發球仰頭動作中承受張力，若單側過緊會導致斜頸或發球動作不協調。
desc_en: Rotates head to track high-speed balls. Under tension during the serve toss look-up; unilateral tightness causes torticollis or uncoordinated service motion.

img_source: User:Mikael Häggström, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在激烈多拍來回後的大口喘氣中，協助穩定喉部。保持頸部前側放鬆對於長時間比賽的體能調節很重要。
desc_en: Stabilizes the larynx during heavy panting after long rallies. Keeping the anterior neck relaxed is important for conditioning in long matches.

img_source: modified by Uwe Gille, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 核心肌群的底層支撐。在發球落地與急停的巨大衝擊下，反射性收縮以承托臟器，與腹肌共同維持腹內壓穩定。
desc_en: Bottom support of the core. Reflexively contracts to support organs against massive shock during serve landings and sudden stops, maintaining intra-abdominal pressure with abs.

img_source: Polygon data were generated by Database Center for Life Science (DBCLS)[2], CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 腿後肌群外側。負責發球時的屈膝蓄力與隨後的髖伸展爆發。在衝刺急停時，離心收縮以防止膝過伸，保護前十字韌帶。
desc_en: Lateral hamstring. Responsible for knee flexion loading in serve and subsequent explosive hip extension. Eccentrically contracts during sprint stops to prevent knee hyperextension, protecting the ACL.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 爆發力衝刺的關鍵。在網球前場救短球（Drop shot retrieval）時，負責快速伸髖加速。在膝關節內側與其他肌肉形成「鵝足」，協助穩定膝蓋抵抗外翻應力。
desc_en: Key for explosive sprinting. Responsible for rapid hip extension when retrieving drop shots. Forms the 'pes anserinus' on the medial knee, stabilizing against valgus stress.

img_source: Polygon data were generated by Database Center for Life Science (DBCLS)[2], CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在硬地急停（Hard stop）時，負責離心收縮控制腳掌落下，吸收地面衝擊。頻繁的急停煞車使此肌肉容易疲勞，引發「脛前疼痛」。
desc_en: Eccentrically contracts to control foot slap and absorb shock during hard stops on hard courts. Frequent sudden braking fatigues this muscle, causing shin splints.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 正手拍擊球動作中，負責將球拍向前上方推動（Low-to-High），與胸大肌共同完成隨揮動作。發球時亦協助手臂上舉。
desc_en: Responsible for driving the racquet forward and upward (Low-to-High) in forehand strokes, completing the follow-through with the pecs. Also assists arm elevation in serving.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在截擊（Volley）與高壓扣殺（Smash）的準備動作中，負責維持手肘抬高的高度。疲勞時手肘下垂會導致擊球點過低，影響攻擊質量。
desc_en: Maintains elbow height during preparation for volleys and smashes. Fatigue causes elbow drop, lowering the contact point and degrading shot quality.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 單手反拍的主力肌群。負責將球拍向後外側展開（水平外展），產生擊球力量。同時在正手拍隨揮結束時，負責減速手臂。
desc_en: Prime mover for the one-handed backhand. Drives the racquet backward/outward (horizontal abduction) for power. Also decelerates the arm at the end of the forehand follow-through.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 負責發球隨揮期（Deceleration phase）的關鍵「煞車」。當手臂極速內旋擊球後，此肌肉必須離心收縮以保護肩膀。網球員肩部傷害最常見的部位之一。
desc_en: Critical 'brake' during the serve follow-through (deceleration phase). Must eccentrically contract to protect the shoulder after rapid internal rotation impact. A very common injury site in tennis players.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在發球拋球時，協助上提肩胛骨。若因緊張而長期聳肩，會導致頸部僵硬，限制頭部轉動與視線追蹤。
desc_en: Assists scapular elevation during the ball toss. Chronic shrugging due to tension causes neck stiffness, restricting head rotation and visual tracking.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 發球加速期（Acceleration phase）的主要內旋肌。與胸大肌、背闊肌共同產生巨大的拍頭速度。同時負責穩定肱骨頭前側。
desc_en: Primary internal rotator during the serve acceleration phase. Generates massive racquet head speed with the pecs and lats. Also stabilizes the anterior humeral head.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 肩袖肌群中最易受傷者。在發球手臂外展與過頂動作中，負責啟動外展並將肱骨頭壓入關節。重複的過頂擊球易導致夾擠症候群。
desc_en: Most injury-prone rotator cuff muscle. Initiates abduction and compresses the humeral head during serve abduction and overhead motions. Repetitive overhead shots often lead to impingement syndrome.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 「小背闊肌」。協助發球時強力的肩內旋與內收動作。在發球加速期與背闊肌協同工作，提升擊球威力。
desc_en: The 'little lat'. Assists powerful shoulder internal rotation and adduction during the serve. Synergizes with the latissimus dorsi during the acceleration phase to boost power.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 與棘下肌共同作為肩關節後方的穩定器。在發球減速期控制肱骨頭，防止其撞擊肩峰。
desc_en: Works with infraspinatus as a posterior shoulder stabilizer. Controls the humeral head during the serve deceleration phase, preventing subacromial impingement.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 發球高舉手臂（Trophy Pose）時，負責穩定肩胛骨並將其下壓，為肩關節創造活動空間。無力會導致夾擠風險增加。
desc_en: Stabilizes and depresses the scapula during the high-arm 'Trophy Pose', creating clearance for the shoulder joint. Weakness increases impingement risk.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 反手截擊（Backhand Volley）的關鍵。負責肩胛骨後收，提供穩定的擊球平台，並防止上半身過度旋轉。
desc_en: Key for the backhand volley. Retracts the scapula to provide a stable hitting platform and prevents excessive upper body rotation.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 協助發球時的聳肩動作，保護頸部。但長期過度緊張（壓力或錯誤技巧）會影響頸部活動度與發球流暢性。
desc_en: Assists shrugging during the serve to protect the neck. However, chronic tightness (stress/poor technique) limits neck mobility and serve fluidity.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在激烈的側向滑步後，負責用力將腿收回中線。是網球員最常發生拉傷（Groin Strain）的部位之一。
desc_en: Forcefully adducts the leg back to midline after intense lateral slides. One of the most common sites for groin strains in tennis players.

img_source: Berichard, CC BY-SA 3.0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 強大的髖伸展輔助肌。在深蹲低重心的防守擊球姿勢下，協助臀大肌將身體推起。同時穩定骨盆抵抗旋轉。
desc_en: Powerful hip extension synergist. Helps gluteus maximus push the body up from deep squat defensive shots. Also stabilizes the pelvis against rotation.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 跨越雙關節的內收肌。在網球變向切步（Cutting）時，協助穩定膝蓋內側，並將腿拉向身體中心。
desc_en: Biarticular adductor. Stabilizes medial knee and pulls leg toward body center during tennis cutting movements.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 發球與正手拍的爆發力來源。負責屈髖提腿（如發球時的後腿上提）與伸膝推蹬，將地面反作用力傳遞至軀幹。
desc_en: Power source for serve and forehand. Responsible for hip flexion (rear leg lift in serve) and knee extension drive, transferring ground reaction force to the trunk.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在防守時的開放式站姿中，協助大腿外旋與屈曲，使身體能面朝擊球方向移動。亦穩定膝蓋內側。
desc_en: Assists thigh external rotation and flexion in defensive open stance, orienting the body toward the shot. Also stabilizes the medial knee.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 發球起跳（Jump）的垂直推力主要貢獻者。深層且純粹的伸膝肌，提供強大的爆發力。
desc_en: Major contributor to vertical thrust in the serve jump. Deep, pure knee extensor providing massive explosive power.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 側向急停（Lateral stop）時的主要吸震與支撐肌。承受巨大的離心負荷，是穩定膝關節並轉換移動方向的關鍵。
desc_en: Primary shock absorber and supporter during lateral stops. Bears huge eccentric loads; key for stabilizing the knee and redirecting movement.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 膝關節最後30度伸直的關鍵，負責鎖定膝蓋並導引髕骨軌跡。預防網球員常見的髕骨外翻與前膝痛。
desc_en: Key for the last 30 degrees of knee extension; locks the knee and guides patellar tracking. Prevents patellar lateral tracking and anterior knee pain common in tennis.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 發球與擊球時的呼吸控制中樞。透過「吐氣擊球（Exhale on impact）」增加核心穩定性與擊球爆發力。
desc_en: Central hub for breath control in serving and striking. 'Exhale on impact' increases core stability and shot explosiveness.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在激烈來回擊球時，協助強制呼氣，並作為軀幹旋轉鏈的一部分，傳遞力量至上肢。
desc_en: Assists forced expiration during intense rallies. Acts as part of the trunk rotation chain, transferring force to the upper limbs.

img_source: DrJanaOfficial, CC BY-SA 4.0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 正手拍與發球的強大加速器。負責肩關節的屈曲、內收與內旋，產生主要的擊球爆發力。
desc_en: Powerful accelerator for forehand and serve. Responsible for shoulder flexion, adduction, and internal rotation, generating primary impact power.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 若過度緊繃會導致圓肩，限制發球時的手臂上舉幅度與肩胛骨後傾，增加肩夾擠風險。
desc_en: Tightness causes rounded shoulders, restricting arm elevation and scapular posterior tilt during serving, increasing impingement risk.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 肩胛骨的穩定錨。在發球高舉手臂與正手拍隨揮時，負責讓肩胛骨上迴旋，確保肩關節活動順暢，預防翼狀肩胛。
desc_en: Scapular anchor. Upwardly rotates the scapula during high-arm serves and forehand follow-throughs, ensuring smooth shoulder mechanics and preventing winging.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在強力發球或擊球時，穩定鎖骨，保護下方的臂叢神經與血管免受壓迫。
desc_en: Stabilizes the clavicle during powerful serves or strokes, protecting the underlying brachial plexus and vessels from compression.

img_source: modified by Uwe Gille, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在激烈比賽的短暫休息中，協助強制呼氣，加速氣體交換以恢復體能。
desc_en: Assists forced expiration during brief rest intervals in intense matches, accelerating gas exchange for recovery.
